alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 6:31AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 or more inches is possible in the most persistent snow bands. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Expect hazardous travel due to snow covered and slippery roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow from our winter storm is ending across the area with little or no additional accumulation expected. Greatest lake effect snow totals are expected to occur across western portions of the county.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
